Description.Name: Gangplank
Description.Details:
Darius hands you a message. "It's the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreEvilEye],Evil Eye]]. They are claiming [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is an Inheritor spy that betrayed Professor Bambo's location. 

They are demanding we take care of this issue before they collaborate any further with us since they can't risk {TGT_MW.Gender?Male:him|Female:her|NonBinary:their} blowing their plans to raid the cache. Sumire has verified the logs and confirmed there's something suspicious with [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s recent communications. 

How do you want to deal with this, Commander?"

Description.Name: Evidence dismissal and firing
Description.Details:
Throwing away the paper logs from the table, [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] rejects any wrongdoing. "These are all lies, Commander! I had personal matters that explain these calls."

"Maybe." Darius quietly adds, "But you still haven't refuted that you sent unauthorized messages. And that's already a bad breach of security."

"Well, screw you XO!"  [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] stands up pointing at Darius. "You've disliked me from the moment I first stepped into the DropShip. This is a witch hunt!"

Darius doesn't reply but instead simply looks at you. You nod at him in agreement.

Description.Name: Attempted escape
Description.Details:
As you and Darius come to find [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], the MechWarrior quickly realizes that the game is up and reaches towards one of the lockers in the quarters. "Stop right there {TGT_MW.FirstName}!"

As [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] pulls out a small pistol from the locker, you and Darius scramble for cover before a laser beam flies over your heads while {TGT_MW.FirstName} attempts to escape. 

Later, Darius reports back to you."[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] refused to stand down and demanded to get off the ship, so eventually we trapped {TGT_MW.Gender?Male:him|Female:her|NonBinary:them} against an airlock before anyone else got injured or killed. Then we jettisoned {TGT_MW.Gender?Male:him|Female:her|NonBinary:them} into space since [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] wasn't going to allow themselves to be captured."

Description.Name: Out the airlock
Description.Details:
"[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] goes out the airlock. Now." you tell Darius. "Grab a few trusted MechWarriors and let's make sure that {TGT_MW.OBJ} disappears in an 'tragic accident'. For now, don't tell anyone else but the command crew."

Darius slowly nods.

"This is how we deal with traitors. Make sure everyone learns that."

additionalValues: executed as a spy and traitor

Description.Name: Interrogation
Description.Details:
In the middle of the night, Darius and a couple of MechWarriors grab [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] and bring {TGT_MW.Gender?Male:him|Female:her|NonBinary:them} to the sauna cabinet, where Yang has already made the necessary preparations for the interrogation.

"It's simply a matter of fluid dynamics and human anatomy, Commander. I've heard plenty of stories back when I was in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCCAF],CCAF]] about the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMaskirovka],Maskirovka]]'s methods. I believe they called this one a 'Rasalhague Sauna'.

Once {TGT_MW.FirstName} realizes what's about to happen, {TGT_MW.Gender?Male:he|Female:she|NonBinary:they} hardens {TGT_MW.Gender?Male:his|Female:her|NonBinary:their} look. Over the next few hours, {TGT_MW.Gender?Male:he|Female:she|NonBinary:they} refuse to divulge any information about {TGT_MW.Gender?Male:his|Female:her|NonBinary:their} employers or mission despite Yang's efforts. 

Finally, you cancel the interrogation and tell Darius to dispose of [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] using the nearest airlock.

additionalValues: executed as a spy and traitor
